content: Hello Secure Code WG, we're currently organising the next Rust All Hands, and we'd like to get a rough estimate from each of the teams on how many meetings they are interested in having. This is isn't definitive, we're just trying figure out everyone's requirements. Would you be able to provide one for your working group?

No location has been set yet, I would say it's likely to be in Europe though. We also haven't set a date yet so there's no guarantee it's the same month as this years was (Feburary), it could be later in the year.

No location has been set yet, I would say it's likely to be in Europe though. We also haven't set a date yet so there's no guarantee it's the same month as this years was (Feburary), it could be later in the year.

Ah, too bad, no way for me to get to Europe to attend this time. Maybe in the future...
@XAMPPRocky I might be able to come depending on circumstances
We are trying cover anyone who needs help with paying for travel, however we ask if possible to have your employer cover your expenses as part of a conference.
There will be a registration form at a later point when we have more information on the venue. Right now weâ€™re just trying to estimate the schedule.
Oh, Europe this time? I might be actually able to attend!
"this time"? AFAIK, the Rust All Hands has always been in Berlin so far.

An update: I had contacted Tony earlier and we discussed this wg's meeting requirements.
Also, the all hands might not happen in Berlin this year. The venue is TBD. Will update when we have anything official from our side. Thanks
